string.name: msg_first
string.b: This is an app for you to remove ads from various ad networks i.e. Admob, Vpon, KuAd. But still remember to support the app developers by disabling MinMinGuard and clicking the ads. \n\nHave fun with MinMinGuard.

resources.string:
I am really appreciate for your donation! Your financial support helps me continue in my development. You can do multiple donations by clicking the donation button. Thank you very much again!

Best regards, 

Chieh-Min Wang(FatMinMin)

string.name: msg_donation_number
string.b: How much do you want to donate?
